---
title: Costocorporeal Joints
---

One of the synovial joints that make up the ["costovertebral joint" complex]({{< var ref-costovertebral-joint.path >}}) @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.


The [costocorporeal joint]({{< var ref-costocorporeal-joint.path >}}) connects the *head* of the rib to the *costal demifacets* of the two corresponding vertebrae and the [intervertebral disc]({{< var ref-intervertebral-disc.path >}}) @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.
